segments.text: Oh . It looks like Jack is going to make his annual speech .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Couldn't he wait until we're finished eating ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . I'm still hungry , but I guess it's kind of rude to keep eating while he's talking , huh ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you even hear what he's saying ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . He's so far away I can hardly see him ! Let's keep eating !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you turn the lazy Susan for me ? I want some more chicken .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All that's left is a leg . I gave the head to Tim !
segments.speaker: S1
